author: malbouis
body:
#### PR description:

This is to update the mcRun3 and mcRun4 GTs with a Muon DQM AlCaRecoTriggerBits tag, as requested in https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4566/1.html.

The new tag is `AlCaRecoTriggerBits_MuonDQM_v2_mc`.

The GT diffs are below. They show only the updated tag as a difference wrt the last GTs in autoCond.

**phase1_2021_design**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//123X_mcRun3_2021_design_v1/122X_mcRun3_2021_design_v5

**phase1_2021_realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//123X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v1/122X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v5

**phase1_2021_cosmics**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//123X_mcRun3_2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v1/122X_mcRun3_2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v5

**phase1_2021_realistic_hi**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//123X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_HI_v1/122X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_HI_v5

**phase1_2023_realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//123X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v1/122X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v5

**phase1_2024_realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//123X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v1/122X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v5

**phase2_realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts//123X_mcRun4_realistic_v1/122X_mcRun4_realistic_v4

#### PR validation:

runTheMatrix.py -l 12034.0,11634.0,7.23,159.0,12434.0,12834.0 --ibeos -j16

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This is not a backport.
title: include MuonDQM AlCaRecoTriggerBits in mcRun3 and mcRun4 GTs
